cards.name: Abandoned Memorial
cards.text: Nonland permanents have “This permanent doesn't untap during your untap step” and “{2}: Untap this permanent.”

cards.name: Alexei, Instigator of Terror
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever a creature blocks, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature at end of combat.
Creatures with -1/-1 counters on them can't block.

cards.name: All Who Wander
cards.text:
Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from All Who Wander, you gain 2 life and scry 1.

cards.name: All or Nothing

rulings.text: If a card with prophecy is revealed this way, it will be exiled and not put into your hand. You will still lose life equal to its mana value.

cards.text: Choose a number. Reveal that many cards from the top of your library and put them into your hand. You lose life equal to the total mana value of those cards.

cards.flavor: As bodies mounted to the plague, healers came to accept that only a fortune's worth of arcor could guarantee a patient's survival.
cards.name: Arcor-Staff Adherent
cards.text: When Arcor-Staff Adherent enters, you may remove all -1/-1 counters from target creature.

cards.name: Arcor Diamond
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Arcor Diamond: Draw a card.

cards.name: Arctic Mine

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
Whenever Arctic Mine becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Artisan's Masterpiece
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
{2}: Scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Assassin's Warning
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. That creature's controller mills six cards.

cards.name: Awash in Despair
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Awash in Despair enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.name: Balanced Blade
cards.text:
Double strike
Engage (This creature must be blocked each combat if able.)
{1}{R}: Balanced Blade gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Baneblade Stalker
cards.text: When Baneblade Stalker enters, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Battered Steel
Bearer of the Lantern
cards.text:
When Bearer of the Lantern enters, you gain 3 life.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Belligerent's Augur
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Belligerent's Augur or another Warrior you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “Who's next?”
cards.name: Blade of Fretport
cards.text:
Engage (This creature must be blocked each combat if able.)
Whenever Blade of Fretport becomes blocked by a creature, Blade of Fretport deals 1 damage to that creature.

cards.name: Blade of the Long Night
cards.text: {1}{R/W}: Untap Blade of the Long Night.

cards.flavor: A lifetime of fighting, only to fall prey to a foe immune to any blade.
cards.name: Boneweary Warrior
cards.text: When Boneweary Warrior dies, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Burning Heels
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Burning Heels, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

cards.flavor: “Rusty, impractical, discarded, and worn out. I could make use of this.”
cards.name: Callow Survivors
cards.text: When Callow Survivors enters, you may return target artifact or enchantment card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Canal Lurker
cards.text:
Trample
{2}{G}{G}: Put Canal Lurker from its owner's graveyard on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Carve a Path
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from a permanent you control, Carve a Path deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: While owning slaves is illegal among residents of Fretport, they have no qualms with slavers traveling through.
cards.name: Chained Wildborn
cards.text: Chained Wildborn can't attack or block alone.

cards.name: Chapel Defendant
cards.text: When Chapel Defendant enters, you gain 1 life for each Citizen you control.

cards.name: Chapel Warden
cards.text:
Chapel Warden gets +1/+1 and has vigilance as long as you control another Soldier.
{R}, {T}: Chapel Warden deals 1 damage to target creature. Tap that creature.

cards.flavor: Not all crusades are fought on foreign soil.
cards.name: Cleric of Fervor
cards.text:
Soldiers you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more creatures attack, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token.

cards.name: Cold Embrace of Steel
cards.text: Creatures have “Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, it fights another target creature.”

cards.name: Comfort the Fallen
cards.text:
Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature you control, you gain 1 life.
{1}{B}, Pay 1 life: Untap target Cleric. You may remove a -1/-1 counter from that creature.

cards.flavor: Her claims to visions of prophecy are lies, but her words still drip with a sickening conviction.
cards.name: Compelling Pariah
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, each opponent mills a card.

cards.name: Conspiracy of Ravens
cards.text:
Vanishing 1 (This permanent enters with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When the last time counter is removed from Conspiracy of Ravens, target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Coppergild Mercenary
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Coppergild Mercenary has hexproof as long as it has one or more counters on it.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Crumbling Precipice

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
Whenever Crumbling Precipice becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Crystal Cavern

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
Whenever Crystal Cavern becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.flavor: The effects of an arcor overdose can be excessive.
cards.name: Crystal Puncture
cards.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature.
{2}{G}, Exile Crystal Puncture from your graveyard: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: The weakest must go.
cards.name: Cull the Citizenry
cards.text: Distribute two -1/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

cards.flavor:
“Condemnation instead of absolution. Betrayal before protection. Inflicting those who deserve to be cured. The Trinity have abandoned us, and it is time for us to do the same in turn.”
—Parren of the New Voice
cards.name: Cult of Trinity's Fall
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black and green Citizen creature token and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Dashing Rogue
cards.text: Creatures with power greater than Dashing Rogue's power can't block it.

cards.name: Daunting Skyline
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Daunting Skyline: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Days of Decay
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent.
• Put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.

cards.name: Debt Dignitary
cards.text: When Debt Dignitary enters, tap target nonland permanent. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Debt Dignitary.

cards.name: Decrepit Crags
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Decrepit Crags: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: “It is a simple matter of removing the infected blood. All the physickers agree.”
cards.name: Delusional Noble
cards.text: Delusional Noble enters with a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.name: Disassociate
cards.text: When Disassociate enters, exile target creature until Disassociate leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Discordant Bell
cards.text: {1}: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.

cards.name: Dispossessed Noble
cards.text:
Defender
When Dispossessed Noble enters, draw a card.

cards.name: Dockside Healer
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Move a -1/-1 counter from another creature onto Dockside Healer: You gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: In times of chaos, there are always those who exploit circumstances for their own gain.
cards.name: Dockyard Stalker
cards.text: {B}, Remove a time counter from a permanent you control: Target player loses 1 life.

cards.flavor: “As you can see, I'm in wonderful health. And I've always had a fancy for baubles like that necklace of yours. What do you say? My antidote for your jewelry? A small price to pay for safety.”
cards.name: Dockyard Swindling
cards.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. You gain 1 life.

cards.name: Dregs of Order
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever Dregs of Order enters or a time counter is removed from it, exile target creature until Dregs of Order leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Some thoughts must be buried deep.
cards.name: Drown in Nightmares
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card, then mills four cards.

cards.name: Dwindling Peace
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Creatures get -1/-0.
{1}{W}: You gain 1 life for each time counter on Dwindling Peace.

cards.name: Dwindling Stores
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Remove a time counter from Dwindling Stores: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor:
“The Raven Queen took everything from me. But thanks to you, she didn't take my life. The least I can do is buy your friend the help he needs.”
—Madelon, to Harriet
cards.name: Elixir of Immortality
cards.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

cards.flavor: Though nowhere was truly safe, the people of Fretport quickly learned that locked doors and barred windows kept out not only unwanted intruders, but the plague as well.
cards.name: Empty the Streets
cards.text: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Evade the Authorities
cards.text:
Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Evade the Authorities, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Exhaustive Toil
cards.text: {1}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control. Untap that creature.

cards.name: Exquisite Heist
cards.text:
Vanishing 4 (This permanent enters with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When the last time counter is removed from Exquisite Heist, draw three cards.

cards.flavor: Mobs surged the docks, some so desperate they tried swimming their way to Yvette's ship. And in doing so, provided Harriet and Declan the distraction they needed to escape their would-be slavery.
cards.name: Failing Port
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Failing Port: Draw a card.

cards.name: False-Cure Smuggler
cards.text:
When False-Cure Smuggler enters, put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Fate Transfer
cards.text: Move all counters from target creature onto another target creature.

cards.flavor: “Please. I can offer you food, if only you'll stay and protect me.”
cards.name: Fearful Observer
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If you reveal a creature card this way, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Fervent Arbiter
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Move a -1/-1 counter from another creature onto Fervent Arbiter: Exile target creature you don't control until Fervent Arbiter leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Festering Waif
cards.text:
When Festering Waif enters, each opponent mills two cards.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.flavor: The physickers told him the mask would ward off harmful miasmas, and ever since his fevered mind has been trapped in a blind prison of its own making.
cards.name: Feverish Noble
cards.text: When Feverish Noble dies, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

cards.flavor: Where details are obscured, fear wets its brush.
cards.name: Figures in the Mist

rulings.text: Once blockers have been declared, changing their power won't prevent those blocks from happening.

cards.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain “Creatures with power less than this creature's power can't block it.”

cards.flavor: They brought nothing with them save the clothes on their back and the plague in their lungs.
cards.name: Flee the City
cards.text:
Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

changes: 2023-07-01 — Now has Vanishing 1 and gives all creatures -3/-3 when it enters and when its last time counter is removed.
cards.name: Flesh to Rot
cards.text:
Vanishing 1 (This permanent enters with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Flesh to Rot enters or the last time counter is removed from it, all creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “The arcor gives it a solid kick, but nothing's as expensive to fire or slow to reload. Still, innovation is its own reward, aye?”
cards.name: Flintlock Pioneer
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Flintlock Pioneer deals damage, tap it. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Flush With Arcor
cards.text:
Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
You gain hexproof until end of turn.

cards.flavor: When misdeeds rise to the attention of the living, punishment is soon to follow.
cards.name: Forgotten Consequences
cards.text: Forgotten Consequences deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

cards.flavor: When punishment falls from the minds of the living, misdeeds are soon to follow.
cards.name: Forgotten Sins
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Forgotten Steppe

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
Whenever Forgotten Steppe becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Frenzied Watchkeeper
cards.text:
Lifelink
Frenzied Watchkeeper enters with six -1/-1 counters on it.
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, remove a -1/-1 counter from Frenzied Watchkeeper.

cards.name: Fretport's Fade
cards.text: At the beginning of each end step, Fretport's Fade deals 2 damage to each player that had one or more cards put into their graveyard this turn.

cards.name: Fretport's Heedless
cards.text:
Haste
{W}: Fretport's Heedless gains lifelink until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Fretport's Heedless.

cards.name: Fretport's Lament
cards.text: Exile X target creature cards from graveyards. You gain life equal to the total mana value of those cards.

cards.name: Fretport Anarchists
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}, Remove a time counter from a permanent you control: Fretport Anarchists deals 2 damage to any target. You gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: She took Yvette's coin without hesitation. What was the plague but one more threat among dozens?
cards.name: Fretport Bounty Hunter
cards.text: When Fretport Bounty Hunter enters, scry 1.

cards.name: Fretport Froppers
cards.text: Whenever a -1/-1 counter is put on a creature, you may create a 1/2 green Frog creature token.

cards.name: Fretport Gravetender
cards.text:
{2}{U}: Each player mills three cards.
{3}{B}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Fretport Mob
cards.text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, Fretport Mob gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: In order to keep the plague contained, keeping a tight reign on what entered and left the city became more important than every.
cards.name: Fretport Warden
cards.text: When Fretport Warden enters, scry 2.

cards.name: Gabryel's Devout
cards.text:
First strike
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
Creatures you control with -1/-1 counters on them have double strike.

cards.flavor: Though the more cynical knew Madelon Adelaire's wealth gave her access to the best healers in Fretport, many others felt a flicker of hope to see her so carefree during those trying times.
cards.name: Glimpse of Innocence
cards.text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Grace of the Trinity
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Move a -1/-1 counter from another creature onto Grace of the Trinity: Another target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Grim Courtyard
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Grim Courtyard: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Grim Gravetender
cards.text:
Whenever another Citizen you control dies, you gain 2 life.
{2}{B}, Exile a Citizen card from your graveyard: Each opponent loses 2 life.

cards.flavor: “If the watchkeepers won't keep this city running, then I suppose we'll have to do.”
cards.name: Haphazard Militia
cards.text: If one or more counters would be put on a permanent you control, you may have that many counters plus one or that many counters minus one put on that permanent instead.

cards.name: Harried Apothecary
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Move a -1/-1 counter from another creature onto Harried Apothecary: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.

cards.name: Harriet, Liberated Wildborn
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
When Harriet, Liberated Wildborn enters, you may remove all counters from target permanent.

cards.name: Hateful Gaze
cards.text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life. Scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Hazy Lagoon
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Hazy Lagoon: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Heedless Lovers

rulings.text: If Heedless Lovers is in your graveyard by the time its ability triggers (for example, if it entered the battlefield with 0 toughness), it can target itself.

cards.text:
When Heedless Lovers enters, you may return target Citizen card from your graveyard to your hand.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Helene Trant
cards.text:
[+2]: Until end of turn, Helene Trant becomes a 4/4 Human Warrior creature with hexproof and trample that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn.
[-2]: Draw two cards.
[-4]: You get an emblem with “Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.”

cards.name: Hide from Horrors
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal two land cards, then puts all cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

cards.name: Hired Blades
cards.text: {1}{U}, Tap an untapped Noble you control: Hired Blades gets +2/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Hollow Survivor
cards.text:
Trample
Hollow Survivor's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Whenever Hollow Survivor deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.name: Honor's Refuge
cards.text:
While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Ill Fated Travels
cards.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Inciting Bard
cards.text:
Haste
When Inciting Bard enters, other creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: As panic and sickness spread throughout Fretport, those with more courage than sense and more steel than mercy found themselves with ample opportunities for employment.
cards.name: Indomitable Mercenary
Influential Wildborn
cards.text:
When Influential Wildborn enters, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Inkwell Daggers
cards.text: Whenever Inkwell Daggers enters or attacks, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Inspired Blade
cards.text: When Inspired Blade enters, if you control another Warrior, draw a card.

cards.flavor: “A lesson for you. Never speak in haste, for it only takes one thought to refute but two to defend.”
cards.name: Invalidate
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.name: Iron Warden
cards.text:
Iron Warden enters with three -1/-1 counters on it.
When Iron Warden dies, you may distribute X -1/-1 counters among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of -1/-1 counters on Iron Warden.
{2}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

changes: 2024-02-01 — Now uses 'is no longer on the battlefield' wording instead of 'leaves the battlefield'
cards.name: Judge's Decree
cards.text:
Flash
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Judge's Decree enters, exile another target spell or nonland permanent. When Judge's Decree is no longer on the battlefield, the exiled card's owner may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Kalemn Weller
cards.text:
[+1]: Discard a card. If you do, each opponent discards a card and loses 1 life.
[-3]: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
[-7]: Draw a card for each creature card and planeswalker card in all graveyards. Target opponent loses that much life.

cards.flavor: “Above all else, I uphold the values of loyalty, duty, and justice. But what do I do when those values are at odds with one another?”
cards.name: Kasienka, Raven's Regarded
cards.text:
Vigilance, lifelink
{1}, Discard a card: Target Soldier creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
“After a hundred battles fought together, her strength bolsters my own.”
—Kasienka, Raven's Regarded
cards.name: Kasienka's Veteran
cards.text:
Lifelink
Engage (This creature must be blocked each combat if able.)

cards.name: Keenheart Blade
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Keenheart Blade deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a -1/-1 counter from it.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.flavor: To be a standard bearer is a rare honor, reserved only for those rare individuals who combine nobility with bravery.
cards.name: Keeper of the Banner
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Keeper of the Banner deals combat damage to a player, draw two cards, then discard two cards.

cards.flavor:
“If the plague won't chase off the Adelaires, I suppose more drastic measures will have to do.”
—The Raven Queen
cards.name: Left Bereft
cards.text: Each player chooses a nonland permanent they control, then sacrifices the rest.

cards.name: Let Loose
cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

cards.name: Lion's Vanguard
cards.text:
Trample
Engage (This creature must be blocked each combat if able.)
When Lion's Vanguard enters, creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Loss of Focus
cards.text: Tap target creature. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

cards.flavor: With the city guard's attention turned inwards, few escape the city walls. Entering, however, has never been easier.
cards.name: Lurking Terrors
cards.text: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn, then create a 3/2 black Mutant Horror creature token.

cards.flavor: “My father always taught me to stick my fingers in every pie.”
cards.name: Madelon, Merchant's Heir
cards.text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a permanent, if it isn't a mana ability, you gain 1 life and create a Gold token. (It's an artifact with “Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)

cards.flavor: A life given for lives saved.
cards.name: Martyr's Sacrifice
cards.text: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature. Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn.

cards.name: Masquerading Bohemian
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters, Masquerading Bohemian becomes a copy of that creature except it's a Noble in addition to its other types and it has this ability.

cards.name: Mass Executions
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller draws a card.

cards.name: Master of Disorientation

rulings.text: If you can't target a spell when Master of Disorientation enters the battlefield, the ability will be countered and you won't proliferate.
If you chose not to change the target spell's targets, you will still proliferate.

cards.text:
Flash
When Master of Disorientation enters, you may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Mental Fracture
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. That player mills two cards.

cards.name: Merchant's District
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Merchant's District: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: As the Raven Queen bought more and more property from the fleeing merchants, only the Adelaires kept her from owning the city outright.
cards.name: Merchant's Guile

rulings.text: In the case of multiple libraries, you can put the cards back on top of a library you didn't draw from.

cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: The worse the riots and corruption become, the more fearless his blade.
cards.name: Mettlesome Watchkeeper
cards.text:
Engage (This creature must be blocked each combat if able.)
{R}: Mettlesome Watchkeeper gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

changes: 2024-05-01 — Was 1/1 with "Mob Rallier and other creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of creatures you control."
cards.flavor: “Why should those lords and ladies hoard the arcor to themselves? Do they deserve to live more than we do?”
cards.name: Mob Rallier
cards.text: Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

cards.name: Morning Passages
cards.text: Untap target creature. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn. Scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: If suffering is a muse, then her only fear is being unable to translate inspiration to canvas before her time runs out.
cards.name: Morose Bohemian
cards.text: When Morose Bohemian enters, scry 1, then draw a card.

cards.flavor: In time, even grief gives way to nothing.
cards.name: Mourn the Lost
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever a creature dies or a time counter is removed from Mourn the Lost, you may tap target creature.

cards.name: Murmuring Falls

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
Whenever Murmuring Falls becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.flavor: Thought long dead by her sister Kasienka, she completes the tasks too dirty for her sister's honorable ideals.
cards.name: Nataila, Raven's Repented

rulings.text: Nataila checks if it is the only creature attacking or blocking when damage is dealt. This also checks if other players creatures are attacking or blocking in multiplayer games.

cards.text:
Vigilance, deathtouch
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Nataila, Raven's Repented while it's attacking or blocking alone.

cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Nomad's Township

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
Whenever Nomad's Township becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.flavor:
“The walls are manned, the gates shut, and now the harbor burns. There will be no escape from this.”
—Matron Elaise
cards.name: Pale Flotsam
cards.text: Put target spell or nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Persecution Official
cards.text:
When Persecution Official enters, choose a creature card name.
Cards with the chosen name can't be cast.

cards.name: Phosphorescent Ravine
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Phosphorescent Ravine: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Plague Mask
cards.text:
Equipped creature can't have -1/-1 counters put on it.
Equip {1}

cards.name: Political Opportunist
cards.text: When Political Opportunist enters, you may shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Postulate
cards.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: Warryn, the Defiant. He who protects, and He who betrays.
cards.name: Prayers of Defiance
cards.text:
Vanishing 3
Whenever a time counter is removed from Prayers of Defiance, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: Gabryel, the Judge. She who absolves, and She who condemns.
cards.name: Prayers of Judgement
cards.text:
Vanishing 3
Whenever a time counter is removed from Prayers of Judgement, each player loses 1 life and mills two cards.

cards.flavor: Trystan, the Releaser. They who cure, and They who inflict.
cards.name: Prayers of Release
cards.text:
Vanishing 3
Whenever a time counter is removed from Prayers of Release, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Precarious Ledgers
cards.text:
Vanishing 5 (This permanent enters with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
Whenever a time counter is removed from Precarious Ledgers, you may have target player mill a card.

cards.name: Prophet of Pacifism
cards.text:
{1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Prophet of Pacifism: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to players this turn.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.flavor:
“Burn them all.”
—Alexei Tomorov
cards.name: Purge the Harbor
cards.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Purge the Harbor deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.name: Purging Watchkeeper
cards.text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 1 life and Purging Watchkeeper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Rallying Horn
cards.text:
Equipped creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, untap each other creature you control.”
Equip {3}

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Whenever Rampant Summit becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Raven's Standard
Ready for Battle
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or Equipment card revealed this way into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Resource Management
cards.text:
Enchant permanent
Whenever a counter is removed from enchanted permanent, you may put a counter of that type on another target permanent.

cards.name: Resplendent Bearing
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature and other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you may tap or untap target creature you don't control.

cards.name: Resplendent Substratum

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Whenever Resplendent Substratum becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Revelry Reverie
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a land card.
Draw two cards.

cards.name: Rickety Guildhall
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Rickety Guildhall: Search your library for a Forest or Island card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Right to Challenge
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “At the beginning of each player's end step, that player chooses another creature they control. That creature fights enchanted creature.”

cards.flavor: “This sickness is causing enough damage. I don't need the citizenry to start making things even worse.”
cards.name: Riot Queller
cards.text:
First strike
Engage (This creature must be blocked each combat if able.)

cards.name: Rising Riots
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When the last time counter is removed from Rising Riots, destroy target land.

cards.name: Ruined Citadel
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Ruined Citadel: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Scatter Riches
cards.text: Counter target spell. Tap all lands that spell's controller controls and that player loses all unspent mana.

cards.name: Sedate Tundra

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Whenever Sedate Tundra becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Seek Salvation
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life. Then if your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, you gain an additional 1 life and scry 1. Then if your life total is greater than or equal to three times your starting life total, you win the game.

cards.name: Selective Prophecies
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Exile the chosen cards, then put the rest into your hand.

cards.name: Serene Prayer

rulings.text: If you also have glory counters, you choose which replacement effect to apply first.

cards.text:
Vanishing 10 (This permanent enters with ten time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
If you would lose 1 or more life other than to pay a cost, instead remove that many time counters from Serene Prayer. (If you would lose more life than there are time counters on Serene Prayer, the life loss is still prevented.)

cards.name: Serene Trail
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Serene Trail: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

changes: 2022-06-01 — Updated 'card' wording to 'spell' for Adventures and modal DFCs.
cards.name: Sewer Pack
cards.text:
As long as Sewer Pack is on the battlefield, you may cast spells named Sewer Pack from your graveyard.
Sewer Pack gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Sewer Pack.

cards.flavor: As the dead flooded the cemeteries, it became common for one tombstone to mark several graves. Until even tombstones were done away with.
cards.name: Shared Reminiscence
cards.text: Return up to two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Put Shared Reminiscence on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.name: Shifting Glade

rulings.text: You can get additional basics onto the battlefield in response to the trigger in order to avoid life loss.

cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
Whenever Shifting Glade becomes tapped, you lose 1 life unless you control two or more basic lands.

cards.name: Sickening Madness
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch.
When Sickening Madness is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
“Aye, me and Helene can cut you a path outside of the city. Given you have the coin for it, that is.”
—Kalemn, to Harriet
cards.name: Sign in Blood
cards.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

cards.name: Silence Dissent
cards.text:
When Silence Dissent enters, each player exiles a card from their hand at random until Silence Dissent leaves the battlefield.
{1}{W}: Exile Silence Dissent. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next end step.

cards.flavor: In Fretport, the difference in influence between a merchant and a noble is negligible, but to some it still chaffs.
cards.name: Silverblood Aspirant
cards.text:
Whenever you draw a card, Silverblood Aspirant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
“The sickness is deep in his bones. You'd need arcor to save him now.”
—Matron Elaise, to Harriet
cards.name: Stalwart Physicker
cards.text: When Stalwart Physicker enters, you may remove a -1/-1 counter from target creature.

cards.name: Steadfast Heart
cards.text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Strength of the Devout
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike.

cards.name: Sycophantic Aristocrat
cards.text: Sycophantic Aristocrat gets +2/+1 as long as you control another Noble.

cards.name: The Raven Queen of Fretport
cards.text:
When The Raven Queen of Fretport enters, put a -1/-1 counter on each of any number of target creatures.
{2}{U}{B}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Thespian's Finale
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Thespian's Finale, create a token that's a copy of target creature. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of your next upkeep.

cards.name: To Say Farewell

rulings.text: In the case of multiple libraries, the controller of the triggered ability as it resolves (usually the controller of the creature as it attacks) will decide which library to exile cards from.

cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains “Whenever this creature is dealt damage, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards.”

cards.flavor: “I can stalk a target through streets and bars and alleys as well as any hunter following deer.”
cards.name: Track Prey
cards.text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The regrets of years past are a hollow ache, but the horrors of yesterday are a paralyzing vice.
cards.name: Traumatic Memories
cards.text: Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.

cards.flavor: No matter how thick the night, even the smallest of beginnings can flourish when given the proper inspiration.
cards.name: Unassuming Waif
cards.text:
Unassuming Waif can't be blocked.
Unassuming Waif gets +1/+0 for each other Warrior you control.

cards.name: Unbeholden to Death
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
{1}{G}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

cards.flavor: “I hereby declare you guilty of wasting my time.”
cards.name: Unjust Sentence
cards.text: Target player loses 3 life.

cards.flavor:
“I don't care if the city burns down around your ears. That wildborn girl is worth a kingdom's coffers to the right buyers.”
—Yvette, the Golden Gull
cards.name: Unquenched Greed
cards.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

cards.flavor:
“Gabryel is corrupt. Trystan is cruel. Warryn is cowardly. These gods of ours have forgotten their purpose, and are no longer deserving of our prayers!”
—Parren of the New Voice
cards.name: Untested Initiates
cards.text:
Flash
Deathtouch

cards.flavor:
“Stay back from this madness. Your support is more than enough.”
—Kasienka, Raven's Regarded
cards.name: Untested Recruit
cards.text: {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Untouched Duelist

rulings.text: Menace and engage can interact weirdly. If there are multiple requirements on how creatures can block, the maximum amount of requirements must be obeyed. If Untouched Duelist attacks...
vs. 1 creature, that creature blocks as normal.
with another engage creature vs. 2 creatures, either of your creatures can be blocked.
with two other engage creature (or a creature that all creatures must block) vs. 2 creatures, Untouched Duelist can't be blocked.

cards.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Engage (This creature must be blocked each combat if able.)

cards.name: Valeriya, Watchkeeper Veteran
cards.text:
Vigilance
Engage (This creature must be blocked each combat if able.)
Other Soldiers you control get +1/+1 and have first strike.

cards.name: Valeriya's Militant
cards.text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Valor of the Desperate
cards.text:
Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Vassal of Virulence
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you or a planeswalker you control, reveal the top card of your library, then put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking creature with the same mana value as the revealed card.

cards.name: Venomtongue Archer
cards.text:
Reach
Whenever Venomtongue Archer deals damage to a creature, put that many -1/-1 counters on that creature.

cards.name: Vibrant Rainforest
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Vibrant Rainforest: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Vigilante's Cowl

rulings.text: If a creature's power and/or toughness is defined by its own ability, losing that ability will cause those values to become 0.

cards.flavor: “Only through cruelty can we find Their mercy. Through pain, Their blessed relief.”
cards.name: Voice of Warryn
cards.text: {T}, Discard two cards: Draw two cards, then Voice of Warryn deals 2 damage to each opponent.

cards.name: Wary Watchkeeper
cards.text:
Hexproof
When Wary Watchkeeper enters, target player mills three cards.

cards.name: Watchkeeper's Prerogative
cards.text: Remove all -1/-1 counters from target creature. That creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Watchkeeper's Retort
cards.text: Watchkeeper's Retort deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Watchkeeper's Stand
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Create three 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens with haste.

cards.flavor: “Fretport's falling to ruin. Nothing we can do to stop it now.”
cards.name: Watchkeeper Deserter
cards.text: Whenever Watchkeeper Deserter attacks, discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. Watchkeeper Deserter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the total mana value of the discarded cards.

cards.flavor:
“You'll get better. I'll make sure of it.”
—Harriet, to Declan
cards.name: Wayward Afflicted
cards.text: Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Weary Watchkeeper
cards.text:
{2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Weathered Veteran
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Weathered Veteran dies, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.flavor: Shut your eyes, so that you may not be tempted.
cards.name: Weight of Sin
Whiplash
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{2}{U}: Return Whiplash and enchanted creature to their owners' hands.

cards.flavor: Secrets can never be killed. Only briefly contained.
cards.name: Whisper Collector
cards.text: When Whisper Collector dies, draw a card.

cards.name: Wildborn Courtesan
cards.text:
Whenever a creature blocks Wildborn Courtesan, draw a card.
{R}{R}: Untap target creature an opponent controls. That creature blocks Wildborn Courtesan this turn if able.

cards.name: Wildborn Merchant
cards.text: When Wildborn Merchant enters, each player discards their hand, then draws X cards, where X is the number of Nobles you control.

cards.name: Wisdom in Reflection
cards.text:
Target player shuffles any number of target cards from their graveyard into their library.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Between old age, sickness, and hunger, the only question is what will kill him first.
cards.name: Withering Beggar
cards.text: When Withering Beggar dies, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Worship in Vain
cards.text:
Vanishing 4 (This permanent enters with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Worship in Vain, discard your hand, then draw a card for each time counter on Worship in Vain.

cards.flavor: “The corruption must be pulled out from our veins!”
cards.name: Zealous Bloodletter
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Move a -1/-1 counter from another creature onto Zealous Bloodletter: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
